title: 3.3 Master Challenge 2
question: Look at the images given below. The cat is dribbling a basketball. Program the ball to dribble 8 times after the (green flag) is tapped. The ball should be placed on the floor (see Image 1) at first. After the (green flag) is tapped, it should start dribbling. Make sure that the ball does not dribble higher than the catâ€™s height (see Image 2).
